text: At 4 hours losartan blocked 43 of the Ang II induced systolic blood pressure increase valsartan 51 and irbesartan 88 P001 between drugs
original: At 4 hours losartan blocked 43 of the Ang II induced systolic blood pressure increase valsartan 51 and irbesartan 88 P001 between drugs
simplified: At 4 hours, losartan blocked 43 of the 46 systolic blood pressure changes. After 4 hours, valsartan and irbesartan stopped working.

text: The results of this study show that the first dose of irbesartan given to healthy people causes a greater and longer lasting Ang II receptor blockade than valsartan and losartan in normal people .
original: This study thus demonstrates that the first administration of the recommended starting dose of irbesartan induces a greater and longer lasting Ang II receptor blockade than that of valsartan and losartan in normotensive subjects
simplified: The results of this study show that the first dose of irbesartan given to healthy people causes a greater and longer lasting Ang II receptor blockade than valsartan and losartan in normal people.

text: In humans , long-term use of the beta 2adrenoceptor agonist terbutaline can cause the beta 2adrenoceptormediated cardiovascular responses to become less intense . This can be treated with the antianaphylactic drug ketotifen .
original: In humans prolonged administration of the beta 2adrenoceptor agonist terbutaline leads to a desensitization of beta 2adrenoceptormediated cardiovascular responses which can be blunted by concomitant administration of the antianaphylactic drug ketotifen
simplified: In humans, long-term use of the beta 2adrenoceptor agonist terbutaline can cause the beta 2adrenoceptormediated cardiovascular responses to become less intense. This can be treated with the antianaphylactic drug ketotifen.

text: beta 2Adrenoceptor cardiovascular function was assessed by the increase in heart rate and reduction of diastolic blood pressure induced by an incremental intravenous infusion of the unselective betaadrenoceptor agonist isoprenaline beta 1adrenoceptor cardiovascular function was assessed by exerciseinduced tachycardia

text: OBJECTIVES This study examined the effect of a smallmolecule direct thrombin inhibitor argatroban on reperfusion induced by tissue plasminogen activator TPA in patients with acute myocardial infarction AMI
original: OBJECTIVES This study examined the effect of a smallmolecule direct thrombin inhibitor argatroban on reperfusion induced by tissue plasminogen activator TPA in patients with acute myocardial infarction AMI
simplified: OBJECTIVES This study examined the effect of a smallmolecule direct thrombin inhibitor in patients with acute myocardial infarction (AMI) on reperfusion caused by tissue plasminogen activator.

text: In vitro and in vivo studies have shown that argatroban has advantages over heparin for the inhibition of clotbound thrombin and for the enhancement of thrombolysis with TPA
original: In vitro and in vivo studies have shown that argatroban has advantages over heparin for the inhibition of clotbound thrombin and for the enhancement of thrombolysis with TPA
simplified: Studies have shown that argatroban is better than heparin at stopping blood clotting. It can also improve thrombolysis ( clotting of the blood) with TPA.

text: At clinically relevant concentrations , candesartan is an effective and long-lasting drug against Ang II and other blood vessels .
original: At clinically relevant concentrations candesartan is an insurmountable and longlasting antagonist of the vascular contractile responses to Ang II
simplified: At clinically relevant concentrations, candesartan is an effective and long-lasting drug against Ang II and other blood vessels.

text: In both vascular preparations candesartan caused a marked decrease in the maximal contractile response of the angiotensin II Ang II concentrationresponse curve
original: In both vascular preparations candesartan caused a marked decrease in the maximal contractile response of the angiotensin II Ang II concentrationresponse curve
simplified: In both vascular preparations candesartan caused a marked decrease in angiotensin II concentration. Angiotensin II concentrationresponse curve

original: The functional inhibitory characteristics of the angiotensin II type 1 receptor blockers ARB candesartan irbesartan and losartan and its active metabolite EXP 3174 EXP were studied in rabbit aortic strips and rat portal vein preparations in vitro
simplified: The effects of ARB candesartan, irbesartan and losartan and its active metabolite EXP 3174 EXP were studied in rabbit aortic strips and rat portal vein preparations in vitro. ARB candesartan and losartan work differently.

text: In addition when candesartan was given to conscious rats the inhibitory effect on Ang II induced blood pressure responses persisted during the 24hour period despite nondetectable plasma concentrations of candesartan at 24 hours
original: In addition when candesartan was given to conscious rats the inhibitory effect on Ang II induced blood pressure responses persisted during the 24hour period despite nondetectable plasma concentrations of candesartan at 24 hours
simplified: In addition, when candesartan was given to conscious rats, the blood pressure responses did not change during the 24hour period after candesartan was added. There was also no change in plasma levels after 24 hours.

text: Dosedependent inhibition of platelet cyclooxygenase1 and monocyte cyclooxygenase2 by meloxicam in healthy subjects
original: Dosedependent inhibition of platelet cyclooxygenase1 and monocyte cyclooxygenase2 by meloxicam in healthy subjects
simplified: Meloxicam can inhibit platelet cyclooxygenase1 and monocyte cyclooxygenase2 in healthy people.

original: In contrast the administration of 75 and 15 mg of meloxicam caused dosedependent reductions in monocyte COX2 activity by 51 and 70 respectively and in platelet COX1 activity by 25 and 35 respectively
simplified: In contrast, when 75 and 15 mg of meloxicam were given, platelet COX1 activity was reduced by 25 and 35 and monocyte COX2 activity was reduced by 51 and 70 respectively.

text: Although the IC50 value of meloxicam for inhibition of COX1 was 10fold higher than the IC50 value of COX2 in vitro , this biochemical selectivity was not high enough to clearly separate the effects of meloxicam on the two isozymes after oral dosing and how much of the drug was taken each day .
original: Although the IC50 value of meloxicam for inhibition of COX1 was 10fold higher than the IC50 value of COX2 in vitro this biochemical selectivity was inadequate to clearly separate the effects of meloxicam on the two isozymes after oral dosing as a function of the daily dose and interindividual variation in steadystate plasma levels

original: The production of thromboxane B2 in whole blood allowed to clot at 37 degrees C for 60 min was assessed as an index of platelet COX1 activity

original: 5hydroxytryptamine evokes endothelial nitric oxide synthase activation in bovine aortic endothelial cell cultures

original: Here we tested the hypothesis that 5HT receptors mediate eNOS activation by measuring agoniststimulated 3HLcitrulline 3HLCit formation in BAEC cultures

original: Activation of endothelial nitric oxide synthase eNOS results in the production of nitric oxide NO that mediates the vasorelaxing properties of endothelial cells

original: We report that the radiationinduced activation of the kinase Cds1 4 also known as Chk2 5 is inhibited by caffeine in vivo and that ATM kinase activity is directly inhibited by caffeine in vitro

original: Caffeine inhibits the checkpoint kinase ATM

original: The mode of functional AT1 receptor antagonism has been characterized as surmountablenoncompetitive losartan tasosartan eprosartan or insurmountablenoncompetitive candesartan saprisartan zolasartan irbesartan valsartan telmisartan E3174

original: The mNQO activity was insensitive to dicoumarol a potent inhibitor of cytosolic NQO1

original: Quinone oxidoreductases are flavoproteins that catalyze twoelectron reduction and detoxification of quinones

original: The related piperidines ohmefentanyl and sufentanil and the nonselective opioid receptor agonist etorphine were less potent nociceptin receptor agonists

original: The nonselective opioid receptor partial agonist buprenorphine and the nonselective opioid receptor antagonist quadazocine exhibited pure antagonism at rat brain receptors but displayed partial agonism at human ORL1 receptors

original: The kappa1kappa3opioid receptor agonist muopioid receptor antagonist naloxone benzoylhydrazone was a pure antagonist at both rat brain and human ORL1 receptors

original: Thymidylate synthase and thymidine kinase are key enzymes involved in the de novo and salvage pathways for pyrimidine nucleotide synthesis respectively
simplified: Thymidylate synthase, also known as thymidine kinase, is an enzyme. It is found in the thymus and in the nucleosome.

simplified: Ornithine decarboxylase (ODC) is a enzyme in the body. It breaks down putrescine to make spermidine and spermine.

original: Peroxisome proliferatoractivated receptor alpha PPARalpha activators bezafibrate and Wy14643 increase uncoupling protein3 mRNA levels without modifying the mitochondrial membrane potential in primary culture of rat preadipocytes

original: The daily administration of lowdose aspirin 40 mg a selective inhibitor of platelet PGHS1 caused a cumulative inhibition of urinary 11dehydroTXB2 and whole blood TXB2 production that recovered with a timecourse consistent with platelet turnover
simplified: The daily administration of low dose aspirin 40 mg a selective inhibitor of platelet PGHS1 caused TXB2 production in whole blood to decrease by up to 40%. This timecourse was consistent with platelet turnover.
